testCases.name: Authentication Flow
testCases.description: Complete authentication workflow including login, token extraction, user data fetch, and logout

steps.userAction: Open BotSpot login URL in browser
steps.myObservations: Successfully loaded Auth0 Universal Login page. Page structure documented.
steps.uiState: Login form with email, password, Google OAuth option
steps.notes: Auth0 hosted login with custom branding. Rate limit: 100 requests.

steps.userAction: Enter username and password, click login button
steps.myObservations: Credentials submitted via form. Auth0 returned authorization code.
steps.notes: Uses PKCE flow (code_challenge_method=S256). Authorization code in callback URL.

steps.userAction: Wait for redirect after successful login
steps.myObservations: Callback URL received with authorization code. Token exchange initiated.
steps.notes: Redirect to https://botspot.trade with code parameter. Token exchange successful.

steps.userAction: Stay on logged-in page
steps.myObservations: Tokens extracted from localStorage using JavaScript evaluation.
steps.notes: Auth0 React SDK stores tokens in localStorage. Access token valid for 24 hours.

steps.userAction: Navigate to profile/account page or wait for initial data load
steps.myObservations: Multiple API calls made on login: user_profile, ensure-user, checkout/cart, login-stats
steps.notes: BotSpot makes 7+ API calls on login to fetch user data, subscription status, and onboarding strategies.

steps.userAction: Click logout button
steps.myObservations: Client-side logout: localStorage cleared, redirected to Auth0 login page
steps.notes: No explicit logout API call. Token remains valid until expiration (24h). Client-side only.

testCases.name: Create Strategy Workflow
testCases.description: Complete strategy creation process from navigation to generation completion

steps.userAction: Click on 'Create Strategy' menu item or button
steps.notes: Document page load and any initial API calls

steps.userAction: Enter strategy description/requirements in the form
steps.notes: Note form fields and validation

steps.userAction: Click submit/generate button
steps.notes: Capture POST request with strategy parameters

steps.userAction: Wait and observe progress indicators
steps.notes: Identify if using polling, websockets, or SSE for progress updates

steps.userAction: Wait for generation to complete
steps.notes: Document completion event and any messages/errors

testCases.name: Strategy Results
testCases.description: View and download generated strategy artifacts

steps.userAction: Click to view generated code or navigate to code view
steps.notes: Capture API endpoint that returns strategy code

steps.userAction: Click download button for Mermaid diagram
steps.notes: Document download endpoint and file format

steps.userAction: View strategy details page
steps.notes: Capture metadata API call (name, created date, description, etc.)

testCases.name: Backtesting
testCases.description: Configure and run backtest with custom parameters

steps.userAction: Click backtest button or navigate to backtest page
steps.notes: Document backtest configuration UI

steps.userAction: Set start date and end date for backtest
steps.notes: Note date format and any other configuration options

steps.userAction: Click run backtest button
steps.notes: Capture POST request with backtest parameters

steps.userAction: Observe progress indicators during backtest
steps.notes: Document progress polling or streaming mechanism

steps.userAction: View completed backtest results
steps.notes: Capture results API endpoint and data structure

testCases.name: Historical Data
testCases.description: Access previously created strategies and backtests

steps.userAction: Navigate to strategies list page
steps.notes: Document GET endpoint for strategies list, pagination, filters

steps.userAction: Navigate to backtests list page
steps.notes: Document GET endpoint for backtests list

steps.userAction: Click on a strategy from the list
steps.notes: Capture GET /strategies/{id} endpoint

steps.userAction: Click on a backtest from the list
steps.notes: Capture GET /backtests/{id} endpoint
